org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

Class DefaultDeviceRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.DefaultDeviceRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceRegistry

    public class DefaultDeviceRegistry
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceRegistry
    The default implementation of the DeviceRegistry interface.
    Inherit this class in order to be notified about changes in the DeviceRegistry.
